"Loyola University.

" "Masters: Information Technology

" "Indus University.

" "Bachelors: Computer Engineering

"

"SoftVan

" "Ahmedabad, India

" "Full Stack Developer Intern

" "• Member of development team, deployment and maintenance for Voice Banking

" "• Developed using Amazon Web Services for back-end; Alexa Eco dot as front-end.

" "• Functionalities implemented login to account, create new bank account, manage balance using voice commands

" "• Learnings: Understanding the importance of Implementation of voice commands in the banking sector, having a professional degree of safety. Plus, how emerging the field of voice over commands is.

" "

" "SoftVan

" "Ahmedabad, India

" "Intern

" "• Member of development team, deployment and maintenance for retail portal

" "• Developed using hibernate framework. Utilized Java J2EE for back-end; HTML5, CSS3, bootstrap for front-end and MySQL for database.

" "• Features implemented User management, Product management, Complain management, Payment management.

" "• Learnings: Tried to achieve maximum efficient usage of the retail portal by adding functionalities [i.e. user management, payment management, etc.]

"
